MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool SetAlpha(float32 alpha) cil managed

Docs.param: The translucency of the display list, must be a value between 0.0f and 1.0f
Docs.summary: Sets the translucency level for the display list.
Docs.returns: True if the value changed, false if the new value was the same as the previous value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool SetAmbientShadowColor(valuetype Android.Graphics.Color color) cil managed

Docs.param: The color this RenderNode will cast for its elevation shadow.
Docs.summary: Sets the color of the ambient shadow that is drawn when the RenderNode has a positive Z or elevation value and is drawn inside of a Canvas#enableZ() section.
Docs.returns: True if the value changed, false if the new value was the same as the previous value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool SetCameraDistance(float32 distance) cil managed

Docs.param: The distance in pixels, must always be positive
Docs.summary: Sets the distance along the Z axis (orthogonal to the X/Y plane on which RenderNodes are drawn) from the camera to this RenderNode.
Docs.returns: True if the value changed, false if the new value was the same as the previous value.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SetUseCompositingLayer (bool forceToLayer, Android.Graphics.Paint paint);
.method public hidebysig instance bool SetUseCompositingLayer(bool forceToLayer, class Android.Graphics.Paint paint) cil managed

Docs.param: if true this forces the RenderNode to use an intermediate buffer. Default & generally recommended value is false.

The blend mode, alpha, and ColorFilter to apply to the compositing layer. Only applies if forceToLayer is true. The paint's alpha is multiplied with #getAlpha() to resolve the final alpha of the RenderNode. If null then no additional composition effects are applied on top of the composition layer.
Docs.summary: Controls whether or not to force this RenderNode to render to an intermediate buffer.
Docs.returns: True if the value changed, false if the new value was the same as the previous value.

Docs.value: The shadow color set by #setSpotShadowColor(int), or black if nothing was set
